meanings.definition: Having a rounded body type with a tendency to gain weight easily.
meanings.sent1: She had a pyknic figure, always struggling to keep the extra pounds off.
meanings.sent2: The pyknic man found it challenging to maintain a slim physique.
meanings.sent3: Despite his pyknic build, he loved to dance and move around.
meanings.sent4: Her pyknic shape resembled a soft, cuddly teddy bear.
meanings.sent5: The pyknic silhouette stood out in the crowd, attracting attention.

meanings.definition: A person with a stocky build and a tendency to be overweight.
meanings.sent1: The pyknic in the group always enjoyed hearty meals and desserts.
meanings.sent2: Being a pyknic, he had to watch his diet to stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: The pyknic's love for food was evident in every family gathering.
meanings.sent4: His pyknic frame made him a formidable player on the rugby team.
meanings.sent5: The pyknic's jovial personality matched his robust appearance.
